channel.title: MySQL Error
channel.description:
I receive this error every time I try to run my server with MySQL (did Martin's vBulletin integration tutorial).
Connetion rejected, Wrong username or password, or ip is banned, or host is down . java.sql.SQLException: Unable to connect to any hosts due to exception: java.net .SocketException: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.net.SocketException MESSAGE: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect
STACKTRACE:
java.net.SocketException: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect
at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja va:143) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:225) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:1807) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:452) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :411) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185) at server.vBulletin.connect(vBulletin.java:68) at server.vBulletin.run(vBulletin.java:94) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:1875) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:452) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :411) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185) at server.vBulletin.connect(vBulletin.java:68) at server.vBulletin.run(vBulletin.java:94) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)
Posted it on other forums as well, however, no one could help - was wondering if Moparscapers are smarter. :rolleyes:

item.title: MySQL Error
item.dc:creator: @Xavalan Xavalan
item.description:
@Xavalan wrote:

I know it is something to do with this line : public static vBulletin vb = new vBulletin(“localhost”, “”, “”, “”, vBulletin.Type.vBulletin);

But I just can’t seem to figure out the fucking problem.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Xavalan wrote:

I receive this error every time I try to run my server with MySQL (did Martin’s vBulletin integration tutorial).

Connetion rejected, Wrong username or password, or ip is banned, or host is down
.
java.sql.SQLException: Unable to connect to any hosts due to exception: java.net
.SocketException: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect

** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **

MESSAGE: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect

STACKTRACE:
